Package org.receipt

Class BookingReceipt

java.lang.Object
org.receipt.BookingReceipt
public class BookingReceipt extends Object
This class contains information about the flat booking, including applicant details, flat type, and project information. It provides methods to generate and display receipts, as well as track the confirmation status of the booking.

    Constructs a new booking receipt with the specified details.

      public BookingReceipt(String flatType, String applicantName, int applicantAge, String applicantNRIC, String projectDetails, String applicantMartialStatus)
      Constructs a new booking receipt with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      flatType - the type of flat being booked
      applicantName - the name of the applicant
      applicantAge - the age of the applicant
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      projectDetails - details about the HDB project
      applicantMartialStatus - the marital status of the applicant

    • confirm

      public void confirm()
      Returns whether the booking is confirmed.

    • displayBooking

      public void displayBooking()
      Displays the booking information to the console. This method prints all relevant details of the booking in a user-friendly format.

    • generateReceipt

      public void generateReceipt()
      Generates and prints a formatted receipt to the console. This method creates a detailed receipt with the current date and time.
